name: moon-stone
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Evolves a clefairy into clefable, a jigglypuff into wigglytuff, a munna into musharna, a nidorina into nidoqueen, a nidorino into nidoking, or a skitty into delcatty.
short_effect: Evolves a Clefairy into Clefable, a Jigglypuff into Wigglytuff, a Munna into Musharna, a Nidorina into Nidoqueen, a Nidorino into Nidoking, or a Skitty into Delcatty.

flavor_text.x-y: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is as black as the night sky.
